name: CodeCrafters
description: CodeCrafters (YC S22) makes programming challenges for experienced engineers. e.g Build your own Claude Code, BitTorrent, or Redis from scratch - in any language. We would not be anywhere without the generous work of all the maintainers and contributors to the various OSS we depend on.
shortDescription: CodeCrafters would not be anywhere without the generous work of all the maintainers and contributors to the various OSS we depend on.
